channel.title: The forums are changing!
channel.description:
Slowly, we are morphing the Forums into bigger and better things.
A First scar script section has been added which can be found here : [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?board=38.0]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?board=38.0[/url] This is a board for people to post their first few scar scripts and hopefully get constructive critisism from other members about how they could improve in their scripting techniques. Be nice to everyone here - not everyone are scripting gods ;)
More boards will be added slowly as we see fit.
If you have a good suggestion about what we should add or remove, post it here!
Thanks
